skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: Ballet is specific in its forms and techniques. This can be performed alone or as part of an opera which is best known for its point work, grand pas de deux and high leg extensions. Many have noticed that it has a striking similarity with fencing because of their development during the same periods of history, but more likely, since both arts had common requirements in terms of balance and movement. Find out All About Ballet , from our daily Flash Briefings. Just Enable our Skill and …. Enjoy ! The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
